name: Golf Your Plankton
description:
/!\ Unfinished and quite unplayable /!\

Made in 3 hours (each) for Triple Trijam 2022:

Graphics, Music - Silurius

Programming - Bellatrion

Theme: Deep Waters

The idea was to make a "mini-golf" game in which a plankton must reach its loved one with the least possible number of moves.

This is our first build, after 3 hours, but is not really playable so far.

Font: 

Water Galon by Khurasan (www.khurasan.net)
